om.question
Class InitParams

java.lang.Object
  om.question.InitParams

public class InitParams
extends java.lang.Object

Parameters that are passed to a question when it is being initialised.

This is represented by a class, rather than including separate parameters, so that we can add necessary initialisation parameters without having to recompile code.

Construct and set values.

Parameters:
lRandomSeed - Random number seed
sFixedColourFG - Fixed FG colour #rrggbb or null if not fixed
sFixedColourBG - Fixed BG colour or null
dZoom - Zoom factor (1.0 = normal)
bPlainMode - Plain mode on/off
cl - ClassLoader for resources
iFixedVariant - Fixed question variant (-1 for normal)
config -
